summary: HomePage hero section shown in the diff no longer includes the banner block, but two additional non-UI files were modified even though the request called for limiting changes to HomePage only (no other pages/components).

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove a specific banner from `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` and avoid modifying other parts; updating project tracking/state was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository documentation/summary file describing multiple frontend files.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request updating file summary documentation; it also implies changes beyond the HomePage edit.
